title: Arkansas Post National Memorial: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       The Arkansas Educational Television Network (AETN) has helped promote National Park Sites and State Parks in Arkansas through its Park Initiative program. Two exciting programs featuring Arkansas Post are available on the AETN website: Exploring Arkansas was filmed in spring 2009. That episode is located at  http://www.aetn.org/programs/exploringarkansas/video/archives/arkansas_post_national_memorial The second program is 3D footage filmed in the summer of 2009. This is located at http://www.aetn.org/parks/3d
